Placebos have traditionally involved concealment. But they can also work when prescribed transparently as open-label placebos," especially as a conditioned stimulus. RCT (N=51) finds post-op patients consumed ~30% less daily morphine. https://t.co/4N5fvPfcop @PAINthejournal https://t.co/YNtLJ2N7m6

This is mind boggling. This bird perfectly imitates the sounds of camera shutters and chain saws. Its the vocal equivalent of flamboyant bowers. https://t.co/t4tSulcwgK
@mcm_ct Yes, of course there are delays (both in reporting and in accrual of bad outcomes, which are delayed with respect to vaccination). Do you have a citation for 'three months'?

@mcm_ct I think it is unlikely you know something about the COVID-19 epidemic that I do not, but it is surely possible. Can you be more specific? Are you alluding, perhaps, to the temporal element (ie, 1 in 1M deaths, but just over 4 months given current prevalence)? Tweets are short.

For avoidance of confusion, let me add: Given one set of data issues here (e.g., likely under-reporting of asymptomatic cases), we can also calculate the CFR as 112/6,720=1.6%, which is at the upper end of consensus estimates of the CFR in unvaccinated people. 4/
@RiverTamYDN Yes. (See comment about data issues.) We can also calculate the CFR as 112/6,720=1.6%, which is roughly in keeping with CFR (at the upper end of consensus estimates).
@imbernomics Yes. (See comment about data issues.) We can also calculate the CFR as 112/6,720=1.6%, which is roughly in keeping with CFR (at the upper end of consensus estimates).

The bottom line is that these vaccines for COVID-19 are miraculously effective. So far, only about 1 in a million people who are vaccinated have died from COVID-19. And reports so far show amazing safety, too. Get vaccinated. For yourself. For your family. For your community. 3/

If you calculate the IFR of SARS-CoV-2 among the vaccinated using these (admittedly imperfect) data, you get 112/9,245=1.2%. This would mean IFR is higher than among the unvaccinated. But 45% of breakthrough cases post vaccination are among those 60. So maybe not. But... 2/

COVID-19 Breakthrough Case Investigations and Reporting | CDC https://t.co/GgtIwXvrLt via @CDCgov 95,000,000+ fully vaccinated 9,245 infections (0.01%) 594 COVID-related hospitalizations (0.0006%) 112 COVID-related deaths (0.0001%) However... 1/

@GadSaad @EricTopol Ah I see. So sorry. I dont believe Im trying to curry favor with anyone. I do believe I was and am grateful for your support. I dont believe Im different in public or private. I have no memory of who I used to follow, but I do curate the list occasionally to maintain breadth.
@GadSaad @EricTopol So sorry! I read the thread and thought I understood. Can you clarify for me?

@GadSaad @EricTopol While I strongly supported Biden, I had one brilliant friend who, unaccountably, voted for Trump. Many long conversations ensued. He pointed out just what you are saying: I don't agree with everything 'my' candidates say or do, so why should I expect him to do so?
